channel.title: dokuwiki on 大大的小蜗牛
channel.description: Recent content in dokuwiki on 大大的小蜗牛

item.title: Dokuwiki Nginx 伪静态
item.description: rewrite ^(/)_media/(.*) $1lib/exe/fetch.php?media=$2 last; rewrite ^(/)_detail/(.*) $1lib/exe/detail.php?media=$2 last; rewrite ^(/)_export/([^/]+)/(.*) $1doku.php?do=export_$2&id=$3 last; location / { if (!-f $request_filename) { rewrite ^(/)(.*)?(.*) $1doku.php?id=$2&$3 last; rewrite ^(/)$ $1doku.php last; } }
